name: Lady Jhessica's Belt
special_spell: At end of their turn, the bearer removes 100 Dodge from adjacent enemies for 1 turn.

name: Cocoa Dofus
special_spell:
Each ranged attack suffered while you are in close combat with an enemy grants a chocolate mark.

These marks are consumed at the end of your turn; each one gives 25% of your level in shield for 1 turn.

name: Prytekt
special_spell: The bearer gains 550% of their level in shield points on the first turn, 200% on the second turn and 100% on the third.

name: Shiny Prytekt
special_spell: The bearer gains 150% of their level in shield points on the first turn, 450% on the second turn and 150% on the third.

name: Iridescent Prytekt
special_spell: The bearer gains 100% of their level in shield points on the first turn, 200% on the second turn and 350% on the third.

name: Pryssure
special_spell: The bearer gains 1 AP for 3 turns but inflicts -10% damage.

name: Shiny Pryssure
special_spell: The bearer gains 2 AP for 2 turns but inflicts -35% damage.

name: Iridescent Pryssure
special_spell: The bearer gains 4 AP for 1 turn but inflicts -50% damage.

name: Surpryz
special_spell: The bearer gains 15% Critical for 3 turns.

name: Shiny Surpryz
special_spell: The bearer gains 35% Critical for 2 turns.

name: Iridescent Surpryz
special_spell: The bearer gains 100% Critical for 1 turn.

name: Pryndsight
special_spell: For 1 turn, the bearer gains as much Power as damage suffered by enemies, up to 200 Power (3 turns).

name: Shiny Pryndsight
special_spell: For 1 turn, the bearer gains as much Power as damage suffered by enemies, up to 300 Power (2 turns).

name: Iridescent Pryndsight
special_spell: For 1 turn, the bearer gains as much Power as damage suffered by enemies, up to 600 Power (1 turn).

name: Prycapture
special_spell: The bearer gains 1 MP (2 turns) per enemy more than 15 cells away.

name: Shiny Prycapture
special_spell: The bearer gains 1 MP (2 turns) per enemy more than 12 cells away and loses 1 AP (2 turns) per enemy within 12 cells.

name: Iridescent Prycapture
special_spell: The bearer gains 1 MP (2 turns) per enemy more than 9 cells away and loses 2 AP (2 turns) per enemy within 9 cells.

name: Prygenerate
special_spell: Heals 15% of enemy damage suffered until the end of the third turn.

name: Shiny Prygenerate
special_spell: Heals 30% of enemy damage suffered until the end of the second turn.

name: Iridescent Prygenerate
special_spell: Heals 100% of enemy damage suffered until the end of the first turn.

name: Prysipitate
special_spell: The bearer gains +2 AP for their first round.

name: Shiny Prysipitate
special_spell: The bearer gains +3 AP for their first round but also loses 2 MP.

name: Iridescent Prysipitate
special_spell: The bearer gains +4 AP for their first round but also loses 4 MP.

name: Spryritual
special_spell: The bearer gains 250 AP Parry on the first turn, then 50 AP Parry on the second turn.

name: Prysical
special_spell: The bearer gains 250 MP Parry on the first turn, then 50 MP Parry on the second turn.

name: Pryank
special_spell: At the end of their first turn, the bearer reduces damage by 5% (3 turns) for each enemy (excluding summons) in their line of sight.

name: Shiny Pryank
special_spell: At the end of their first turn, the bearer reduces damage by 10% (2 turns) for each enemy (excluding summons) in their line of sight.

name: Iridescent Pryank
special_spell: At the end of their first turn, the bearer reduces damage by 20% (1 turn) for each enemy (excluding summons) in their line of sight.

name: Disaprys
special_spell: The bearer becomes invisible (1 turn) at the start of their first round.

name: Prywitchment
special_spell: Reduces the duration of active effects on the bearer by 4 at the start of their first round.

name: Pryshield
special_spell: The bearer gains 200% of their level in shield (infinite) for each opponent (excluding summons) that plays before them.

name: Pryximity
special_spell: At the start of their first round, the bearer gains 200% of their level in shield (infinite) for each enemy (excluding summons) in their line of sight.

name: Prymune
special_spell: The bearer reduces all types of damage suffered by 80% on the first turn.

name: Gravprysy
special_spell: The bearer gains the Gravity state as long as they have not suffered any damage. If they suffer damage, the duration of the state changes to 1 turn.

name: War's Halbaxe
special_spell: If the bearer is in close contact with an enemy at the start of their turn, they gain 20 MP Reduction for 1 turn; if not, they gain 30 Lock. When the bearer kills an opponent (excluding summons) with direct damage, they gain 1 MP until the end of the fight, stackable max. 3 times.

name: Corruption Pestilence
special_spell: When the caster returns to 100% HP via healing or a health steal, they apply a start-of-turn poison in their best element on entities two cells away or less. The poison lasts 2 turns, cannot be unbewitched, and can be stacked a maximum of 1 time.

name: Servitude's Embrace
special_spell: At the end of each turn, the bearer attracts entities in a 3-cell cross around themself by 2 cells. If the bearer has no entities next to them at the end of their turn, they enter the Unmovable state until the start of their next turn. The state is removed if they suffer damage.

name: Misery's Flail-Scale
special_spell: When the bearer suffers an AP, MP or Range reduction, the damage they suffer is reduced by 4% for 2 turns. Damage suffered by the attacker is increased by 4% for 2 turns. Stackable max. 3 times.

name: Domakuro
special_spell:
Starting on the 5th turn, the caster gains up to 64 damage for the rest of the fight.
This bonus is reduced each time the caster inflicts damage on an opponent during their turn for each of the first 4 turns of the fight:

No attacks: 16 damage.
1 attack: 8 damage.
2+ attacks: 0 damage.

name: Dorigami
special_spell:
Applies 100% of level as Shield at the start of each turn for the first 5 turns. 
During each of these 5 turns, if the caster kills a summons, the caster gains 100% of their level as shield for 2 turns (max. 4 times), and 300% (max. 2 times) for a monster or player.
Shields are only obtained during the caster's turn.

name: Gobbowl Ball
special_spell: [!] DÃ©clenche le combat tactique "Boufbowl"

name: Nightmare Dofus
special_spell:
If the bearer applies or receives a shield, allies within 3 cells or less of the bearer are healed by 7% of their HP. 
If the bearer unbewitches a target, allies within 3 cells or less gain 150 Power for 1 turn (stacks 1 time, cannot be dissipated). 
Each effect can only be triggered once per turn, but if both are triggered in the same turn, the bearer receives 10% additional damage for 1 turn (cannot be dissipated).

name: Sylvan Dofus
special_spell: For each MP used, the bearer gains 8 Power for 2 turns, stackable 20 times. If the bearer does not use any MP, they are healed for 10% of their HP at the end of their turn.
